events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the laptop screen is cracked and doesn't turn on at all. I am very disappointed with this defect.
The case has been categorized under Product Defect due to the reported broken screen and device malfunction.
This case has been assigned to agent Michael Smith for further assistance with the defective laptop issue.
Hello, I’m Michael from customer support. I’m sorry to hear about the cracked screen. Let me assist you with this matter.
Could you please provide photos of the laptop’s broken screen and your order number so I can verify the details and proceed?
I have attached the photos you requested showing the cracked screen, and my order number is #54321. Please let me know the next steps.
Thank you for the photos and info. We can offer you a replacement laptop shipped with expedited delivery or a full refund. Please confirm your preference.
I would prefer a replacement sent as soon as possible. Thank you for the quick response and the helpful options.
Your replacement order has been processed and will be shipped within 24 hours with tracking information emailed to you shortly.
We hope your replacement laptop arrived in excellent condition. Please let us know if everything is working well or if you need additional support.
Since we have not heard back and you seemed satisfied with the replacement, we are closing this case. Thank you for choosing our service.
